* reworked leaderboard to load all FxA configuration from a fixed JSON blob on a URI.

* Changed scopes to use what is provided by the configuration endpoint.
* Changed the build to hardcode a path to cloudvm.* as the configuration endpoint doesn't have a base URL yet.
Reworked token verification to be strictly after the FxA configuration has been loaded.
enabled JS in the leaderboard webview for React.JS

added a new build flavour called 'leaderboard' to specify dev vs production leaderboard instances

Updated everything to configure the leaderboard based on LB_CONFIG_URL
